items.sentence: I talked to Tom today about what he plans to do.
I think my parents are hiding something from me.
I wouldn\'t be too surprised if you saw a snake.
I\'ll have to work overtime every day next week.
We probably won\'t have to go to Boston anymore.
We shouldn\'t have left Tom alone in the garage.
Tom couldn\'t get the door to close all the way.
Tom couldn\'t have had anything to do with this.
Tom couldn\'t think of any reason for not going.
Tom decided to follow the advice he\'d received.
If you eat that much, you\'ll get a stomachache.
Tom doesn\'t care what Mary does or doesn\'t do.
You must do the work even if you don\'t like it.
Tom might have left his umbrella in Mary\'s car.
Tom pretended not to know Mary\'s email address.
Tom probably didn\'t notice that Mary was there.
Tom probably doesn\'t even know how old Mary is.
Tom lit a match and then lit the candle with it.
Tom may have been in Boston with Mary last week.
Tom might be able to translate this into French.
Tom needed some money to buy something for Mary.
Tom never thought about Mary while she was away.
Let Tom know there will be dancing at the party.
At that time, I was still taking French lessons.
Do you think that these glasses look good on me?
I\'ll teach you a lesson that you won\'t forget.
I\'ll tell Tom he\'s got nothing to worry about.
Tom always gets lost if he doesn\'t carry a map.
I want you to help me find out who stole my car.
I wish I had married your sister instead of you.
I was disappointed because you weren\'t at home.
Mary doesn\'t need to work. Her husband is rich.
I make it a rule to get up early in the morning.
You\'re one of the most brilliant people I know.
You\'re still not completely convinced, are you?
Tom bought a newspaper and read it on the train.
Tom came close to being killed by a stray arrow.
Tom came into the classroom and sat at his desk.
Tom came into the room a few minutes after Mary.
We should\'ve realized that Tom needed our help.
We talked quietly so we wouldn\'t wake the baby.
Mary is going to open a gift from her boyfriend.
Mary was the most beautiful girl in the village.
Don\'t stand under a tree during a thunderstorm.
Don\'t worry about Tom. He always acts that way.
Tom told me that he could get us what we wanted.
Tom wanted Mary to pretend to be his girlfriend.
Tom wants to study French with a native speaker.
Tom was convinced that Mary no longer loved him.
Tom pretended he didn\'t know what was going on.
